response.overview: A Botticelli made flesh, two artist’s models in the studio sitting for a painting, laid out in the sun. Marble statues draped in sheets, wetness and warm summer air, gold, green grass on skin, the hum of insects.  Beauty for beauty’s sake,  touch for the pleasure of touching.  pure sensation, a Sappho poem come to life.
response.tagline: A Botticelli made flesh. Beauty for beauty’s sake, touch for the pleasure of touching. pure sensation, a Sappho poem come to life.
response.title: The Birth of Venus
